meanings.definition: A small, round, flat piece of metal used as a spacer in jewelry making.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny bezes in the jewelry box.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the bezes between the beads on the bracelet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the bezes as shiny coins in its pretend store.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bezes, adding a touch of brightness to the room.
meanings.sent5: The bezes gleamed under the bright lights of the jewelry store.
